name: Swipe Bo: logical blocks sliding puzzle for iPhone
name_original: Swipe Bo: logical blocks sliding puzzle for iPhone
description:
Fresh and cute moving boxes brainteaser with colorful graphics and intuitive game-play! Game starts simply and progress to levels that requires your brain power.

Move Bo to the exit [portal] by sliding your finger in the desired direction. Unlock Game center achievements by passing level with less movements count.

Swipe Bo game features over 10 unique environments objects which make game even more fun.

GAME HIGHLIGHTS
• Challenging and entertaining mind-breaker
• Intuitive game-play
• Colorful graphics
• Game Center and Achievements support
• Over 10 unique environments objects
• Two level packs featuring 80 unique levels
• Hours of fun and challenge

Swipe Bo - challenging brainteaser for everyone who enjoys logical puzzles - get it and YOU WILL LOVE IT!
